alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 11:25AM MDT until May 12 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Fountain Creek Near Fountain Creek near Fountain affecting El Paso County. For the Fountain Creek...including Colorado Springs, Fountain Creek near Fountain...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fountain Creek Near Fountain Creek near Fountain. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 12.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 13.0 feet late tonight. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.1 feet on 04/30/1999. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1130 PM MDT.
